content:
# The Stone Furnace is now working, with 4 units of coal as fuel and 9 units of iron ore ready to be smelted. 
# The furnace is actively processing the iron ore into iron plates. 

# I will wait for the smelting process to complete. 
# I will check the inventory periodically to see when the iron plates are ready.

# Let's wait and check the inventory every second for a maximum of 30 seconds.
for _ in range(30):
    sleep(1)  # Wait for 1 second
    inventory = inspect_inventory()
    if inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 1:  # Check if at least 1 iron plate is produced
        print(f"Inventory after smelting: {inventory}")
        break
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an error if smelting takes too long.
